text: Example The GTP' LGU agents are software components with what is called Limited Availability (LA). These components are not part of the standard product offering but are delivered to meet specific customer needs. As such, they may require further improvements in scope, development, and documentation. This chapter describes the GTP' LGU Collection and ReCollection agents. These agents are real-time extensions of the original GTP' Agent produced specifically for LGU+ with their specifications. Prerequisites The reader of this information should be familiar with: GPRS Tunneling Protocol (GTP) across the Gn and Gp Interface [ 3GPP TS 29.060 V4.2.0 ] Call and event data for the Packet Switched (PS) domain [ 3GPP TS 32.015 V3.9.0 ] This section has the following subsections: GTP' LGU Collection Agent GTP' LGU ReCollection Agent
title: GTP' LGU Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
